医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
季节和日照时间可能会影响体外受精后的活产率根据今天（周四）在世界领先的生殖医学期刊之一《人类生殖》上发表的新研究，在生育治疗期间从女性卵巢收集卵子的时间会对活产率产生影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/Season-and-sunshine-hours-may-affect-live-birth-rates-after-IVF.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/Season-and-sunshine-hours-may-affect-live-birth-rates-after-IVF.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fb44e70d-cee1-4550-82a1-f340b8bbff6f Wed, 05 Jul 2023 23:12:01 -0400 Season and sunshine hours may affect live birth rates after IVF
eHealth 应用程序可帮助患者从重大腹部手术中恢复速度加快 30%通过使用电子健康应用程序 ikHerstel，重大腹部手术后的患者恢复速度比不使用该应用程序的患者快 30%。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/eHealth-app-helps-病人-recover-from-major-abdominal-operations-3025-faster.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/eHealth-app-helps-病人-recover-from-major-abdominal-operations-3025-faster.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e27ae31b-a112-44ba-bfd2-b7b82f4e070c Wed, 05 Jul 2023 23:06:02 -0400 eHealth app helps patients recover from major abdominal operations 30% faster
睡眠不足会削弱体力活动的认知益处伦敦大学学院研究人员的一项新研究表明，随着年龄的增长，定期的体育活动可以防止认知能力下降，但对于睡眠不足的人来说，这种保护作用可能会减弱。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/Short-sleep-can-diminish-the-cognitive-benefits-of-physical-activity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/Short-sleep-can-diminish-the-cognitive-benefits-of-physical-activity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fe2f427e-ebd0-416a-be80-c8a3bce760e2 Wed, 05 Jul 2023 23:02:21 -0400 Short sleep can diminish the cognitive benefits of physical activity
缓解脆性 X 综合征的新疗法可能即将出现由麻省大学陈医学院的 Joel D. Richter 博士、Sneha Shah 博士和 Jonathan K. Watts 博士以及 RUSH 大学医学中心的 Elizabeth Berry-Kravis 博士开发的反义疗法可恢复脆性 X 综合征患者细胞样本中的 FMRP 蛋白。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/New-therapy-to-mitigate-fragile-X-syndrome-may-be-on-the-horizo​​n.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/New-therapy-to-mitigate-fragile-X-syndrome-may-be-on-the-horizo​​n.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2e2793dd-968c-4780-b0d6-1a5d526ad917 Wed, 05 Jul 2023 22:58:04 -0400 New therapy to mitigate fragile X syndrome may be on the horizon
COVID-19 对洛杉矶低收入社区的打击更为严重；疫苗接种被证明是减少差距的关键在洛杉矶推出疫苗之前，低收入社区的 COVID-19 发病率高于高收入社区。然而，接种疫苗后，COVID-19 发病率的差异缩小，最低收入社区受到疫苗接种的影响最大。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/COVID-19-strikes-harder-on-low-venue-communities-in-LA3b-Vaccination-proves-key-to-reducing-disparity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/COVID-19-strikes-harder-on-low-venue-communities-in-LA3b-Vaccination-proves-key-to-reducing-disparity.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ff514f85-584a-4096-b9fa-4b242d1870b7 Wed, 05 Jul 2023 22:45:00 -0400 COVID-19 strikes harder on low-income communities in LA; Vaccination proves key to reducing disparity
对于胎儿发育来说，怀孕期间吸尼古丁可能并不比吸烟更安全科罗拉多大学安舒茨医学院的研究人员发现，怀孕期间吸尼古丁对于发育中的胎儿来说可能并不比吸烟更安全。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/Vaping-nicotine-during-pregnancy-may-be-no-safer-for-developmenting-fetus-than-smoking-香烟.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/Vaping-nicotine-during-pregnancy-may-be-no-safer-for-developmenting-fetus-than-smoking-香烟.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=288fa9f2-08ad-4ff8-bf18-a7ccbb2cfc76 Wed, 05 Jul 2023 22:44:42 -0400 Vaping nicotine during pregnancy may be no safer for developing fetus than smoking cigarettes
技术组合揭示骨关节炎的分子变化骨关节炎是最常见的退行性关节疾病，影响全球 22% 的 40 岁以上成年人。尽管从医学角度对这种情况进行了广泛的研究，但与骨关节炎相关的分子变化仍不清楚。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/Combination-of-techniques-reveals-molecular-changes-in-osteoarthritis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/Combination-of-techniques-reveals-molecular-changes-in-osteoarthritis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=be0d6960-026c-4391-8d09-5011db494bf6 Wed, 05 Jul 2023 22:38:11 -0400 Combination of techniques reveals molecular changes in osteoarthritis
2020 年佛罗里达州基拉戈岛登革热疫情与 COVID-19 危机重叠：呼吁加强疾病检测方案2020 年 COVID-19 大流行期间佛罗里达州登革热疫情的检测和应对，凸显了诊断发热性疾病的挑战和监测的必要性。这项研究探讨了当前大流行背景下登革热病例的影响和管理。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/Dengue-outbreak-overlapped-COVID-19-crisis-in-Key-Largo-Florida-in-2020-Call-for-enhanced-disease-testing-协议.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/Dengue-outbreak-overlapped-COVID-19-crisis-in-Key-Largo-Florida-in-2020-Call-for-enhanced-disease-testing-协议.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=054ac607-8704-4dcc-9dd9-8dd55d5d186e Wed, 05 Jul 2023 22:38:00 -0400 Dengue outbreak overlapped COVID-19 crisis in Key Largo, Florida in 2020: Call for enhanced disease testing protocols
Moderna COVID-19 疫苗对 5 岁及以下儿童有效mRNA-1273 疫苗 (Moderna) 在减少 6 个月至 5 岁儿童的症状性 SARS-CoV-2 感染和 COVID-19 相关住院治疗方面显示出强大的有效性。需要进一步研究来探索长期有效性和加强剂量的潜在需求。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/Moderna-COVID-19-vaccine- effective-in-children- Five-and-under.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/Moderna-COVID-19-vaccine- effective-in-children- Five-and-under.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8c4cb537-3220-41f6-b371-ab93e48a3d59 Wed, 05 Jul 2023 22:28:00 -0400 Moderna COVID-19 vaccine effective in children five and under
牙龈疾病和牙齿脱落与大脑萎缩有关根据美国神经病学学会医学杂志《神经病学》2023 年 7 月 5 日在线期刊上发表的一项研究，照顾好牙齿可能与改善大脑健康有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/Gum-disease-and-tooth-loss-linked-to-brain-shrinkage.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/Gum-disease-and-tooth-loss-linked-to-brain-shrinkage.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1a9f4ef1-ee3d-4445-8d09-5c11310a626e Wed, 05 Jul 2023 22:27:32 -0400 Gum disease and tooth loss linked to brain shrinkage
